name: Dingle in the Dark Dimension
description:
Made in Unity for an asset game jam hosted by myself and madianj.itch.io

Controls : WASD to move, abilities are unlocked through the levels, Left click to attack, right click to block, shift to roll 
Credit to Asset Makers : https://adamatomic.itch.io/cavernas, 
https://hugues-laborde.itch.io/pixelartpacksidescroller
